Text:
Hola,

this Software works really good.
No Virus and no Treats. But, my question
is That i hear something about that the
Company DISKEEPER is spying our
Computers with this Software.
Someone can tell me Something about this?

Thank you very much

Parcero
I got virus varnings from this
Can you guys analyze the fragments of each drive? It seems for me that I can go into the software, but could not manually defrag the drives..
This works fantastic, Thank's, nice job
I'm getting virus warnings as well. Can anyone confirm this is clean?

@Parcero - I did notice that each time you restart your PC or restart the diskeeper service, an HTTPS diskeeper site is contacted as shown by TCPView.  You can block this in firewall, use IPSec or set the diskeeper site(s) in your HOSTS to 127.0.0.1 to stop diskeeper from phoning home.
